name: LOOTera
description:
An Epic story of a biker, who loots coins, gems,magical stones for the 3 Loot boxes with special bike skins (common, rare, legendary), background scenery,  special powers (Shoot bullets, Booster, Slow Down Time). Controls:- A /D- Go Left/Right. S - Brake. Numpad1 - Shoot Bullets. Numpad2 - Boost. Numpad3 - Slow Down time.

Background Concept Art by:- https://www.artstation.com/tushar928

Music: - Made with Groovepad App (Playstore)
